meanings.definition: To smooth or polish with sandpaper.
meanings.sent1: I am sandpapering the rough edges of the wood.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys sandpapering old furniture to make it look new.
meanings.sent3: After sandpapering for hours, my hands felt tired but the table looked great.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was sandpapering away the imperfections in her life.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sandpapering echoed through the workshop.

meanings.definition: The act of using sandpaper to smooth or polish a surface.
meanings.sent1: The sandpapering of the table made it smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the sandpapering coming from the garage.
meanings.sent3: The sandpapering of the floor revealed a beautiful wooden pattern.
meanings.sent4: The constant sandpapering in the room created a cloud of dust.
meanings.sent5: Her favorite part of woodworking was the satisfying sound of sandpapering.
